Pre-Game Insights: The Guardians face the Royals for the final time in the 2024 regular season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be played at Kauffman Stadium at 7:40 p.m. ET.
The game will be broadcast on Bally Sports Great Lakes, WTAM 1100 AM, WMMS 100.7 FM, and the Guardians Radio Network.
Others: The starting pitchers for the Guardians and Royals are RHP Ben Lively (11-8, 3.92) and RHP Seth Lugo (14-8, 3.12), respectively.
